issue.title: [Release] gbenchmark should not be needed for verification
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4657](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4657). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`gbenchmark` is built during verification and thus we require a minimal version of CMake 3.6. I would have guessed that we should not require it as we do not need to build the benchmarks during the verification. I guess that a recent fix from `[~wesmckinn]` may have fixed this, but we should verify this before doing the next release.
